creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas
description: headdress with crown-like top section with three "ears" at top; silver beads around crown; two hanging wedge-shaped pendants covered overall with silver faceted metal beads; hide section with some fur attached to ends; encrusted overall with thick reddish pigment accretions
medium: Leather, iron, copper, fibers, ochre pigment
title: Woman's headdress
